column2: an A.M. Eatery////I came to Snooze for the first time with friends on a Sunday around 8 A.M. in the morning. There was a wait time of approximately 30 minutes in line and another 15 minutes after being seated. They seemed to be short on waitstaff
column3: but our waitress was very sweet and even provided us complimentary pancakes for the wait (Blueberry Danish).
